detail_description: "Il Rifugio" is a charming family-owned restaurant with a cozy atmosphere, featuring rustic decor and a wood-burning stove. The menu offers fresh local meats and cheeses, homemade pasta, and delectable desserts like semifreddo ice cream drizzled with honey. Chef Francesco Nanu curates the menu, which includes unique dishes such as culurgiones stuffed with almonds, orange zest, and guanciale.
name: "Il Rifugio"
address: Via Antonio Mereu, 28, 08100 Nuoro NU, Italy

excerpt: Refined Sardinian tasting menus & wine pairings in an elegant, understated space with framed art.
detail_description: Dal Corsaro is an Italian restaurant in Cagliari which has been awarded a Michelin star. Dishes embracing seasonality and simplicity have won the restaurant its accolade, with seven, nine and eleven-course menus available. The kitchen is run by young Stefano Deidda, who has a mastery of transforming traditional Sardinian ingredients into delicately refined dishes that never disappoint.
name: Ristorante Dal Corsaro
address: V.le Regina Margherita, 28, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Sourdough pizzas & craft beer in an industrial-chic space with stone arches, wood beams & a garden.
detail_description: Framento is a pizzeria and craft beer spot located in an industrial-chic space with stone arches, wood beams, and a garden. It was established in 2015 by chef Pierluigi Fais and is known for its contemporary approach to pizza. The restaurant is set to move to a five-story building with a terrace, where the concept will expand beyond just pizza.
name: Framento
address: Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, 94, 09123 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Artfully presented seafood, pasta & fish, plus Sardinian wines, on a leafy terrace with gulf views.
detail_description: "I Frati Rossi" is a charming restaurant located in Porto Cervo, offering a serene escape from the bustling coastal scene. The restaurant boasts a leafy terrace with stunning views of the gulf, providing an ideal setting to enjoy Sardinian cuisine and local wines. The menu features artfully presented seafood, pasta, and fish dishes, complemented by Sardinian wines.
name: I Frati Rossi
address: Porto Cervo - Costa Smeralda SS IT, Via Paolino Azara, 07021 Pantogia, Italy

excerpt: Sardinian pasta, fish & seafood classics served in a relaxed setup decorated with photographs.
detail_description: Stella Marina Di Montecristo is a renowned restaurant in Cagliari, Sardinia, offering an authentic and delightful seafood dining experience. Despite being Michelin-starred, it provides classic Sardinian dishes without the hefty price tag. The fixed lunch menu offers three courses of delectable seafood options. For a refreshing waterside drink, visitors can head to Emerson or La Paillote, both owned by former Cagliari star Francois Modesto.
name: Stella Marina Di Montecristo
address: Via Sardegna, 140, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Nestled along the stunning seafront of Alghero, Les Arenes is a beloved local gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience. With its inviting terrace shaded by umbrellas, guests can savor breathtaking seaside views while indulging in delicious wood-fired pizzas and regional specialties. The menu features standout dishes like the unique Sardinia-style seafood paella made with fregola and the mouthwatering porceddu al forno, or suckling pig.
name: Les Arenes
address: Via Lido, 73, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Luigi Pomata, located on Viale Regina Margherita in Cagliari, Italy, is known for its interpretation of tuna caught by the fleet of the island of San Pietro. The restaurant is considered one of the great dining options in the city. Over the past decade, Cagliari has emerged as a gourmet destination with a changing culinary landscape. Notable openings like Cucina.
name: Luigi Pomata
address: V.le Regina Margherita, 18, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Quintilio, situated south of Alghero, offers a limited selection between meat and fish. However, this lack of variety does not diminish its high recommendation for visitors in the area. This bustling bar/restaurant can accommodate around 120 people and is particularly popular among locals. The restaurant takes pride in sourcing locally and preparing their dishes fresh, often utilizing a barbecue to cook the meat and fish that change daily based on availability at the nearby market.
name: Quintilio
address: Via S. Josemaría Escrivá de Balaguer, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Modest rooms in a warm B&B featuring a regional eatery with a fireplace, plus a garden.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming seaside village of Santa Lucia, Locanda Tipica Sa Corte is a delightful B&B that captures the essence of Sardinian hospitality. With its modest yet cozy rooms and a welcoming atmosphere, this establishment features a regional eatery complete with a fireplace and an inviting garden. The surrounding area boasts two stunning beaches and lush pine forests, making it perfect for nature lovers.
name: Locanda Tipica Sa Corte
address: Via Nuoro, 138, 08025 Oliena NU, Italy

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Porto Cervo, ConFusion is a contemporary dining gem that promises an unforgettable culinary experience. Under the expert guidance of Chef Antonio Serra and Chef Italo Bassi, this Michelin-starred restaurant artfully blends traditional Sardinian ingredients with innovative cooking techniques. Guests can indulge in a diverse menu featuring everything from exquisite seafood crudo to unique dishes like deer tartare and sea-urchin gelato.
name: Confusion
address: Promenade du port Via Aga Khan 1, Via Porto Vecchio, 1, 07021 Porto Cervo SS, Italy

excerpt: Typical Sardinian dishes rustled up in a brick-&-stone space with quaint alley tables.
detail_description: Su Cumbidu is a restaurant in Cagliari, Italy that offers typical Sardinian dishes in a charming brick-and-stone setting with quaint alley tables. The restaurant is known for its authentic selection of Sardinian cuisine, including dishes like culurgiones, malloreddus alla campidanese, and fregula with artichokes or porcini mushrooms.
name: Su Cumbidu
address: Via Napoli, 13, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Sabores, formerly known as Sapori di Sardegna, is a charming spot located in Cagliari. The store offers a delightful selection of raw milk cheeses, local cured meats, and natural wines. Additionally, there's a kitchen corner where simple yet well-prepared dishes are crafted daily. Visitors can enjoy the ambiance by grabbing a table outside and indulging in the recommended wine while people-watching. The establishment is highly praised for its fantastic food, natural wine offerings, and exceptional service.
name: Sabores
address: Via Lodovico Baylle, 6, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Traditional Sardinian game, cheese & suckling pig in a charming villa with a courtyard.
detail_description: Su Furriadroxu is a charming villa with a courtyard located in the center of Pula, Sardinia. The trattoria offers authentic Sardinian cuisine, with a focus on meat dishes such as the famous porceddu (roast suckling pig). The menu, available in local dialect as well as Italian and English, features a selection of meaty fare. It's recommended to notify the staff in advance if you wish to order the roast suckling pig.
name: Su Furriadroxu
address: Via XXIV Maggio, 11, 09010 Pula CA, Italy

detail_description: The Craf Da Banana Restaurant in Oristano is a great spot for traditional Sardinian dishes, like non-seafood dishes. It's popular in the autumn and winter months, as the mosquitoes aren't too bad during those times. The food is good and the service can be slow at times, but it's worth it for a delicious meal.
name: Craf Da Banana Restaurant
address: Via de Castro, 34, 09170 Oristano OR, Italy

detail_description: Locanda Da Renzo, situated in Siamaggiore just outside Oristano on the west of Sardinia, offers a delightful culinary experience that combines fresh seafood with local pasta. The menu reflects the vibrant flavors of the coast and pays homage to Sardinia's cooking traditions. The location is stylish and perfect for special events. Guests can enjoy spacious and comfortable rooms within an olive tree orchard, complete with a lovely swimming pool and a top-quality floodlit tennis court.
name: Locanda Da Renzo
address: Loc. Sa Turritta, 09070 Siamaggiore OR, Italy

detail_description: Nestled on the charming island of Sant'Antioco in southwestern Sardinia, Da Achille is a culinary treasure that promises an unforgettable dining experience. Named after its talented chef, Achille Pinna, this restaurant beautifully marries traditional Sardinian flavors with modern twists inspired by Thai and Japanese cuisine. Guests are welcomed into a warm and inviting atmosphere where attentive service enhances the overall experience.
name: Da Achille
address: Via Nazionale, 80, 09017 Sant'Antioco SU, Italy

detail_description: Bar Pasticceria Ciro is a popular spot in Alghero known for its delicious pastries and excellent coffee. The cafe offers a wide selection of cakes, sweets, and cookies, including local specialties like crema bruciata pastry and pinolata ice cream. Customers can enjoy their treats inside or outside on the backyard terrace. The staff is highly professional and provides great service. In addition to traditional pastries, there are also vegan options available.
name: Bar Pasticceria Ciro
address: Via Sassari, 35/B, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Abbamele Osteria is a renowned restaurant located in Barbagia, Sardinia, known for its modern reinterpretation of traditional Sardinian recipes. Chef Mauro Ladu skillfully reinvents ancient dishes, incorporating contemporary elements while preserving the essence of the original cuisine. The restaurant offers a culinary journey featuring well-prepared meats, excellent local wines, and a perfect fusion of old and new flavors.
name: Abbamele Osteria
address: Corso V. Emanuele III', 59, 08024 Mamoiada NU, Italy

detail_description: Sa Cardiga e su Schironi is a renowned restaurant located just outside Cagliari, in Maddalena Spiaggia. It's considered one of the best dining establishments in the area and is popular among both locals and tourists. The restaurant prides itself on using fresh, high-quality local ingredients to create delicious dishes with impeccable presentation.
name: Sa Cardiga e su Schironi
address: località Maddalena Spiaggia, 09012 La Maddalena CA, Italy

excerpt: Antipasti, pasta & pizza, plus aperitifs, on a hilltop terrace with views over the city & the sea.
detail_description: Libarium Nostrum is a stylish rooftop bar located in Cagliari, offering stunning panoramic views of the city and the sea. Visitors can indulge in antipasti, pasta, and pizza while sipping on aperitifs as they take in the breathtaking sunset. The hilltop terrace provides an ideal setting for enjoying cocktails with a picturesque backdrop. This trendy spot is perfect for those seeking a memorable experience with delicious food and scenic vistas.
name: Libarium Nostrum
address: Via Santa Croce, 35, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Antico Caffè, established in 1838 by a Genovese immigrant, is one of the oldest cafes in Cagliari. Located under the steps of Bastione St. Remy, it has been a hub for the city's social life since its inception. The cafe's covered terrace offers a beautiful view of the shopping streets, and its interior boasts polished wood, marble, and brass decor.
name: Antico Caffè
address: Piazza Costituzione, 10, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Pasta, pizza & seafood dishes at an airy seaside venue with a covered beachfront terrace.
detail_description: Nestled along the stunning coastline of Stintino, Il Gabbiano is a delightful seaside restaurant that offers an inviting atmosphere with its airy design and covered beachfront terrace. Guests can indulge in a delectable array of seafood dishes, pasta, and pizza while enjoying breathtaking views just steps from the sea. The location is perfect for families, as children can play on the beach while adults savor expertly prepared traditional cuisine in this picturesque setting.
name: Il Gabbiano - Stintino
address: Viale la Pelosa, 32, 07040 Stintino SS, Italy

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Cagliari, Durke Maurizia Pala Srl is a charming sweet shop that transports you back in time with its traditional Italian confections. This delightful establishment specializes in homemade treats crafted from age-old recipes, offering an authentic taste of Italy that you won't find anywhere else. Indulge your senses with their exquisite selection, including fruit and nut-filled papassinos, delectable amaretti di Sardegna, and light ricotta and saffron cheesecakes.
name: Durke Maurizia Pala Srl
address: Via Napoli, 74, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Trattoria Locanda il Genovese 2.0 is a delightful guest house nestled in La Maddalena, just a short distance from the picturesque Punta Nera and Punta Tegge Beaches. This charming B&B offers cozy accommodations with lovely inner courtyard views and balconies, making it an ideal spot for relaxation after exploring the island's breathtaking coastline. Guests have praised the friendly service and delicious food, particularly highlighting their pasta with pesto, excellent focaccia, and flavorful lasagna.
name: Trattoria locanda il Genovese 2.0
address: Via Manfredo Fanti, 10, 07024 La Maddalena SS, Italy

excerpt: The largest covered food market in Italy, with separate departments for produce, fish & more.
detail_description: The Civic Market of San Benedetto is a bustling and vibrant covered food market located in Cagliari, Italy. It is renowned as the largest covered market in Italy and Europe, spanning two stories and 8,000 square meters. The market features separate departments for produce, fish, meat, and more.
name: Civic Market of San Benedetto
address: Via Francesco Cocco Ortu, 46, 09128 Cagliari CA, Italy

name: Coxinendi - Ristorante
address: Via Sant' Antioco, 1, 09025 Sanluri SU, Italy

detail_description: Ristorante Santa Rughe is a charming old trattoria located in the heart of Barbagia, offering a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The restaurant features outdoor seating for summer dining and provides a rustic setting to savor authentic local flavors using high-quality ingredients. Guests have praised its excellent value for money, impeccable service, and delicious homemade dishes. Additionally, the establishment is known for its exemplary takeaway service and good quality pizza despite some comments about slow service.
name: Ristorante Santa Rughe
address: Via Giovanni Paolo II, 07040 Codrongianos SS, Italy

excerpt: Open-air venue with DJ sets & dramatic sunset views, serving cocktails & creative Italian cuisine.
detail_description: Phi Beach is a stunning open-air venue located in Baja Sardinia, offering breathtaking sunset views and featuring DJ sets. This popular spot serves up creative Italian cuisine and a variety of cocktails. It's known for its vibrant atmosphere and is a must-visit destination for those looking to enjoy the best of Sardinia's nightlife scene. Adjacent to beautiful beaches and close to other attractions, Phi Beach offers an unforgettable experience with its combination of music, dining, and natural beauty.
name: Phi Beach
address: Via Forte Cappellini, 07021 Arzachena SS, Italy

detail_description: Rafè coffee & bistrot NoN Stop & shop - American Bar is a popular spot in the heart of Cagliari, offering a range of options from breakfast to evening cocktails. The interior features local products and a street-facing terrace for people-watching. Visitors can enjoy hand-made culurgiones and simple yet delicious pasta dishes, as well as aperitivos like Micodiale Serve and Caipiroska with frutti rossi.
name: Rafè coffee & bistrot NoN Stop & shop - American Bar
address: Via Sardegna, 58 A, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Waterside restaurant serving locally caught fish & seafood dishes on a terrace overlooking the sea.
name: Ristorante Il Pescatore
address: Via Lungomare dell'Acqua Dolce, 7, 08022 Cala Gonone NU, Italy

detail_description: Located in a peaceful semi-central district of Cagliari, Locanda dei Buoni e Cattivi is a restaurant and bed & breakfast that offers a serene environment for new parents. The establishment, which is part of the Domus de Luna non-profit organization, provides a tranquil setting with services suitable for families with young children. Set in a beautiful villa with a garden and spacious terrace, the restaurant supports job reintegration projects to help individuals facing difficulties.
name: Locanda dei Buoni e Cattivi
address: Via Vittorio Veneto, 96, 09123 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Romantic sunset views from the terrace of a stylish seaside restaurant known for meat & shellfish.
detail_description: Ristorante The Kings is a stylish seaside restaurant in Alghero, Sardinia, offering romantic sunset views from its terrace. It is renowned for its focus on fish and seafood, using only the freshest ingredients to create dishes such as tuna, mussels, and red mullet soup. The restaurant's location on the Alghero bastions allows diners to enjoy beautiful sunsets while dining.
name: Ristorante The Kings
address: Bastioni Marco Polo, 5, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Seasonal fish dishes are furnished in an easygoing, nostalgic mainstay with a terrace.
detail_description: Ristorante di Pesce Il Pavone is a charming and relaxed dining spot located on the bustling Piazza Sulis. The bright glass-enclosed dining area is adorned with fresh flowers and white linen tablecloths, creating a nostalgic ambiance. The menu features seasonal fish dishes, including tagliolini pasta with mullet roe and artichokes, as well as potato-stuffed culurgiones topped with sheep's cheese and dried tomatoes.
name: Ristorante di Pesce Il Pavone
address: Piazza Sulis, 3, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Movida is a stunning location situated on the old bastions of the town, offering a spacious outdoor terrace with breathtaking views of the bay and port. It's considered the best spot in Alghero, captivating visitors with its magical setting and delicious Italian cuisine. The restaurant provides excellent service, even near closing time, and offers complimentary treats like a cheeseboard or prosecco. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood dishes while taking in the lovely view of the marina.
name: Movida
address: Bastioni Magellano, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Catalan specialties & Mediterranean dishes with modern twists, in a warm, wood-accented space.
detail_description: Al Tuguri Ristorante Tipico Alghero is a charming dining spot nestled in the historic old town of Alghero, Sardinia. The restaurant offers a delightful fusion of Catalan specialties and Mediterranean dishes with a contemporary twist. Chef and owner Benito Carbonella curates the menu based on seasonal ingredients, ensuring an authentic taste of Sardinian tradition with innovative cooking techniques. The warm and inviting ambiance within a historic building adds to the overall dining experience.
name: Al Tuguri Ristorante Tipico Alghero
address: Via Majorca, 113, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Traditionally furnished trattoria offering regional dishes, open-air dining & a wine bar.
detail_description: Al Refettorio is a charming trattoria located in the historic center, offering traditional regional dishes and a wide selection of wines. The restaurant features outdoor dining under stone archways as well as cozy indoor seating. The menu boasts a variety of light and flavorful dishes, including options for vegetarians, vegans, and those with gluten-free diets. With its fantastic wine selection and beautiful ambiance, Al Refettorio is a popular choice among locals and visitors alike.
name: Al Refettorio
address: Vicolo Adami, 47, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Airy restaurant for lobsters & oysters, plus fish & pasta, in a dining room facing the sea.
detail_description: Nestled along the stunning seafront of Alghero, Ristorante La Lepanto is a must-visit for seafood lovers. This airy establishment boasts a charming covered veranda that offers breathtaking views of the sea, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. The restaurant features an impressive aquarium filled with fresh crustaceans, setting the stage for its renowned lobster dishes.
name: Ristorante La Lepanto
address: Via Carlo Alberto, 135, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Down-to-earth rooms in a laid-back farmstay featuring set Sardinian dinner made with local produce.
detail_description: Agriturismo Depalmas offers a genuine Sardinian farmstay experience, located in the countryside just two kilometers from Stintino and Pelosa beach. The rustic rooms provide a down-to-earth atmosphere for guests to enjoy a traditional Sardinian dinner made with locally sourced ingredients. The fixed menu includes various delicious dishes of generous portions, accompanied by wine, water, coffee, and bitters.
name: Agriturismo Depalmas
address: presso Agriturismo Depalmas, località, Preddu Nieddu, 07040 Stintino SS, Italy

excerpt: Mussels, shrimp, seafood pasta & grilled fish, plus pizza, on a terrace overlooking the harbor.
detail_description: Il Portico is a charming restaurant that offers a unique menu featuring a wide selection of seafood specialties, as well as options for land-based dishes and vegetarian fare. The restaurant's terrace overlooks the harbor, providing a picturesque setting for enjoying mussels, shrimp, seafood pasta, grilled fish, and pizza. The interior boasts modern artwork, stone pillars, and arched ceilings that complement the predominantly traditional cuisine with modern elements.
name: Il Portico Ristorante Pizzeria Cocktail Bar
address: Lungomare Cristoforo Colombo, 113, 07040 Stintino SS, Italy

detail_description: The down home cooking restaurant Ristorante Da Barbara di Asuni Lazzaro e C. is an excellent place to enjoy traditional Sardinian food. The restaurant has a lovely setting in the countryside and the staff are very friendly and go out of their way to provide great service. The food is delicious, fresh and definitely full of flavour, perfect for any occasion.
name: Ristorante Da Barbara di Asuni Lazzaro e C.
address: Via delle Azalee, 20, 09048 Solanas CA, Italy

excerpt: Cozy trattoria with a brick vaulted ceiling, for typical pizza & pasta dishes & fried calamari.
detail_description: Al Vecchio Mulino is a charming trattoria slightly off the tourist track but popular among locals. The former mill features grotto-like ambiance with low, vaulted ceilings and a lively atmosphere. The menu offers a good balance of meat and seafood dishes, including local pasta with sausage-meat sauce, fried squid, prawns, fresh fish, and crusty pizzas.
name: Al Vecchio Mulino
address: Via Don Deroma, 3, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Bombas is a top-notch burger joint that prides itself on using homemade bread, meats sourced from the finest island farms, and thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Established in 2014, this eatery has quickly expanded to include a location in Bologna within just five years. The menu offers an array of options along with daily specials, featuring standout dishes like the burger made with Asinara wild boar meat, pecorino cheese aged on Cannonau marc, and fresh vegetables.
name: Bombas
address: Via Università, 37, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Josto, located near Piazza del Carmine in the heart of Cagliari, is a restaurant owned by chef Pierluigi Fais. Known for his modern interpretation of Sardinian cuisine while staying true to traditional flavors, Fais has made a name for himself with other successful establishments in the area. Josto has been recognized by the Michelin Guide as a Bib Gourmand for its excellent value and is praised for its contemporary atmosphere.
name: Josto
address: Via Sassari, 25, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Ristorante Mabrouk is a historic trattoria located in the center, offering a set menu for dinner at a fixed price. The dining experience includes an array of fresh and seasonally appropriate dishes such as prawns, squid, swordfish, or sea bass served in generous portions. The prix fixe menu offers multiple courses including starters, pastas, mains, dessert, and unlimited drinks for one price. The staff is known to be very friendly and accommodating.
name: Ristorante Mabrouk
address: Via Santa Barbara, 4, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Caffè Svizzero Cagliari, established in 1901 on the first floor of Palazzo Accardo, is a historic café with a romantic atmosphere. The name pays homage to the founders' origins and the underground chapel that once housed St. Augustine's ancient crypt. With its vaulted ceiling and old-world charm, this traditional-style café is popular among locals for morning coffee, pastries, lunch, or evening wine.
name: Caffè Svizzero Cagliari
address: Largo Carlo Felice, 6, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

name: Nikki Beach Costa Smeralda
address: Loc. Cala Petra Ruja, 07021 Arzachena SS, Italy

name: Ristorante Sa Ide e S'Ollia Cagliari
address: Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, 370, 09123 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: ChiaroScuro di Marina Ravarotto is a charming restaurant located on the serene Corso Vittorio Emanuele II in Cagliari. The establishment draws inspiration from Grazia Deledda's literary work and features her phrases and silhouette throughout the menu. The interior exudes a simple yet elegant ambiance with white walls adorned with rustic elements such as baskets, farm tools, copper scales, and traditional fabrics.
name: ChiaroScuro di Marina Ravarotto
address: Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, 380, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Cafè Latino | StreetFood Bar is a charming spot located on Alghero's city walls, offering stunning views of the yachting marina and Capo Caccia. It's a perfect place to relax with a refreshing spritz or fruit juice during the day or night. The bar also serves espresso coffee and traditional Sardinian liquor mirto, which can be enjoyed from its terrace overlooking the harbor and the sea of Alghero.
name: Cafè Latino | StreetFood Bar
address: Bastioni Magellano, 10, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Cagliari, Gelateria Vaniglia e Pistacchio is a charming artisan workshop run by the passionate duo, Moira and Antonello. They pride themselves on using only the freshest local ingredients sourced from Sardinia, including rich milk, creamy sheep's ricotta, Bronte pistachios, and IGP Piedmont hazelnuts. This dedication to quality shines through in their unique gelato flavors that pay homage to traditional Sardinian cuisine.
name: Gelateria Vaniglia e Pistacchio
address: Via Napoli, 30, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy
